title: ii just got moderated for asking for uhaaelp? help it doesn't say im 20levels
body:
i postted this in suppport and help.
https://i.gyazo.com/54ebab13a85060ae68c33e8d8418d719.png
https://i.gyazo.com/a2c9756dc0c425445a8ed7947dc7ac6f.png
iam crying

replies.body:
Help & Support is reserved for players questioning technical issues that they are experiencing with the game (client, bugsplats, patching, etc).

For your specific inquiry, which was in regards to your level not appearing correctly on these Boards, this is something specific to Boards Feedback where the Boards Development team and Rioters could help in syncing your account. Posting normally will auto sync your level (which it looks like it has). Let me know if you are still having issues with showing as level 20.

> [{quoted}](name=Keyru,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=XGh0VyFb,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-11-18T01:23:41.848+0000)
>
> Help & Support is reserved for players questioning technical issues that they are experiencing with the game (client, bugsplats, patching, etc).
> 
> For your specific inquiry, which was in regards to your level not appearing correctly on these Boards, this is something specific to Boards Feedback where the Boards Development team and Rioters could help in syncing your account. Posting normally will auto sync your level (which it looks like it has). Let me know if you are still having issues with showing as level 20.

that is dumb like you, just saying
uhh...am i the only one that realizes OP is a troll? {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

> [{quoted}](name=Bijorn,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=XGh0VyFb,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-11-18T15:13:50.877+0000)
>
> uhh...am i the only one that realizes OP is a troll? {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

i am human
I vote the OP's post not only be deleted, but because of their insults, they also have their forum rights removed for a time.

> [{quoted}](name=Samus72,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=XGh0VyFb,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-11-18T12:37:11.080+0000)
>
> I vote the OP's post not only be deleted, but because of their insults, they also have their forum rights removed for a time./him/

i can say what i want. i believe its dumb and shes dumb. thatss the my oppinion of her/him/agender, ok?

It got deleted as it was posted in the wrong sub-forum. While I do wish that threads posted in the wrong sub-forum would just be moved to the right ones instead of just automatically deleted, next time try to make sure that you're posting a thread in the right sub-forum of the boards.
then what's help and support for? troll

I understand that you're upset but again, name-calling and insults are the quickest way to NOT get help. Riot does look at the boards but they can't respond to every single thread. I'm not Riot so I don't know all the details, but what I do know is that if you want to get in touch with Riot directly the quickest way to do that is through a Support Ticket. It's your choice on whether you want to do that or not but you really should stop with the name-calling and insult-swinging towards people who are trying to help you.

Respect and communication goes both ways so if you want people to be respectful to you then you need to be respectful to them.

> [{quoted}](name=Prandine,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=XGh0VyFb,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-17T23:48:30.475+0000)
>
> It got deleted as it was posted in the wrong sub-forum. While I do wish that threads posted in the wrong sub-forum would just be moved to the right ones instead of just automatically deleted, next time try to make sure that you're posting a thread in the right sub-forum of the boards.

it was posted in help and support
are you a mod? fight me

> [{quoted}](name=xxTonOfDamagexx,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=XGh0VyFb,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-11-18T00:13:25.498+0000)
>
> it was posted in help and support
> are you a mod? fight me

1. I'm not a Moderator and never said I was.
2. If you have an issue with Riot then filing a Support Ticket is the best way to do it.
3. Comments like "fight me" don't help your case, so I'd avoid saying them if I were you.
